'''Illustrations to J.R.R. Tolkien''' is an art book illustrated and printed by Don "D." West ([[1945]]-[[2015]]).<ref>https://twitter.com/FrostRareBooks/status/1679863763279785985</ref> It was published in [[1971]] and was limited to 450 hand-colored copies.
